contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 23, 1997 D Manchester District Contest (Fourth Section)
Manchester District Contest (Fourth Section) 40 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Manchester District Contest manchester-district-contest-fourth-section
Hopwood Hall College, Middleton Prizes - 1st £100 and cup, 2nd £50 and shield, 3rd £25 and rose bowl. Best euphonium soloist prize to John Hamer, Haslingden and Helmshore. 7 bands competed.
Jan. 19, 2012, 2:11 p.m. April 2, 2017, 9:16 p.m.
1 Haslingden & Helmshore Band David Holland Promenade
2 Earby Band Peter Young
3 Uppermill Band Jim Hunter
Unknown Result Elmfield Brass Jack Bennett
Unknown Result Besses Boys Band Andrew Keegan
Unknown Result Sale Brass Band Robert Richards
Unknown Result Middleton Band Bryan Warrington
